member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.Autocomplete
member.summary:
Specifies whether the browser is allowed to automatically enter or select a value for the TextBox.
By default, autocomplete is enabled for TextBox.
Possible values are:
On Specifies that autocomplete is enabled
Off Specifies that autocomplete is disabled.

member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the TextBox. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a TextBox.

member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the TextBox allows the user to interact with it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.Internal.SfInputBase.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the TextBox that the placeholder text floats above the TextBox based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the TextBox when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the TextBox.
Auto The floating label floats above the TextBox after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.example:
In the below code example, showcases a basic ColorPicker component.
<SfColorPicker> </SfColorPicker>

member.summary: Gets or sets a a value that indicates the collection of additional attributes that will applied to the color picker container element.
member.remarks: Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the columns to be rendered in palette mode.
member.value: Accepts a double value. The default value is 10.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates CSS class string to customize the appearance of color picker.
member.value: Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of color picker. The default value is String.Empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.Disabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the color picker.
member.value: true, if the button component is disabled. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.EnableOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the opacity slider.
member.value: true, if the opacity slider is enabled. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to true, the property is persisted.
member.value: true, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Component's property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.EnableRtl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the right to left direction.
member.value: true, if the right to left direction is enabled for the component. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.Inline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable to disable the inlide mode color picker.
member.value: true, if the color picker component is rendered as inline. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the mode of color picker to be rendered.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is
member.remarks: If the ColorPickerMode is Picker, the color picker is rendered as a picker. If the ColorPickerMode is Palette, the color picker is rendered as a palette.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.ModeSwitcher
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the mode switcher option.
member.value: true, if the mode switcher option is enabled. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfColorPicker.NoColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the no color option.
member.value: true, if the no color option is enabled. The default value is false.
member.remarks: No color option is only available in palette mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the collection of custom color values that will be rendered as color picker element.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the apply/cancel buttons.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfInputTextBase`1.BaseFloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the TextBox that the placeholder text floats above the TextBox based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the TextBox when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the TextBox.
Auto The floating label floats above the TextBox after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfInputTextBase`1.ValidateOnInput
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the component validates the input or not.
member.value: true, If the ValidateOnInput is enabled for form validation, then the model value will be updated on entering the value to the input. otherwise, false.The default value is false.
member.remarks: This property is used to validate the form on typing into the input and updating the model value. The ValueChange event will be fired after the component lost its focus.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.AsyncSettingsModel
member.summary: Interface for a class AsyncSettings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.AsyncSettingsModel.ChunkSize
member.summary:
Specifies the chunk size to split the large file into chunks, and upload it to the server in a sequential order.
If the ChunkSize property has value, the Uploader enables the chunk upload by default.
It must be specified in bytes value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.AsyncSettingsModel.RemoveUrl
member.summary:
Specifies the URL of remove action that receives the file information and handle the remove operation in server.
The remove action type must be POST request and define "RemoveFileNames" attribute to get file information that will be removed.
This property is optional.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.AsyncSettingsModel.RetryAfterDelay
member.summary: Specifies the delay time in milliseconds that the automatic retry happens after the delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.AsyncSettingsModel.RetryCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of retries that the Uploader can perform on the file failed to upload. By default, the Uploader set 3 as maximum retries. This property must be specified to prevent infinity looping.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.AsyncSettingsModel.SaveUrl
member.summary:
Specifies the URL of save action that will receive the upload files and save in the server.
The save action type must be POST request and define the argument as same input name used to render the component.
The upload operations could not perform without this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.AllowedExtensions
member.summary:
Specifies the extensions of the file types allowed in the Uploader component and pass the extensions with comma separators.
For example,if you want to upload specific image files, pass `AllowedExtensions` as ".jpg,.png".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.AsyncSettings
member.summary: Configures the save and remove URL to perform the upload operations in the server asynchronously.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.AutoUpload
member.summary:
By default, the Uploader component initiates automatic upload when the files are added in upload queue.
If you want to manipulate the files before uploading to server, disable the AutoUpload property.
The buttons "upload" and "clear" will be hided from file list when AutoUpload property is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.Buttons
member.summary:
You can customize the default text of "browse, clear, and upload" buttons with plain text or HTML elements. The buttons' text can be customized from localization also.
If you configured both `Locale` and `Buttons` property,the Uploader component considers the `Buttons` property value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with root element of the Uploader. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a Uploader.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.DirectoryUpload
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the folder of files can be browsed in the Uploader component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.DropArea
member.summary: Specifies the drop target to handle the drag-and-drop upload. By default, the Uploader creates wrapper around file input that will act as drop target.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.DropEffect
member.summary:
Specifies the drag operation effect to the Uploader component.
Possible values are.
Copy
Move
Link
None

member.summary: Enable or disable persisting Uploader state between page reloads. If enabled, the `Files` state will be persisted.

member.summary: Enable or disable rendering Uploader in right to left direction.

member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the Uploader allows the user to interact with it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.Files
member.summary:
Specifies the list of files that will be preloaded on rendering of Uploader component. The property used to view and remove the uploaded files from server.
By default, the files are configured with uploaded successfully state. The following properties are mandatory to configure the preload files:
Name
Size
Type

summary.para: You can add the additional html attributes such as styles, class, and more to the root element.
If you configured both property and equivalent html attributes, then the Uploader considers the property value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.MaxFileSize
member.summary: Specifies the maximum allowed file size to be uploaded in bytes. The property used to make sure that you cannot upload too large files.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.MinFileSize
member.summary: Specifies the minimum file size to be uploaded in bytes. The property used to make sure that you cannot upload empty files and small files.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.Multiple
member.summary: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether the multiple files can be browsed or dropped simultaneously in the Uploader component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderModel.SequentialUpload
member.summary:
By default, the file Uploader component is processing the multiple files simultaneously.
If SequentialUpload property is enabled, the file upload component performs the upload one after the other.

member.summary:
Specifies a value that indicates whether the NumericTextBox component allows the value for the specified range.
True- the input value will be restricted between the min and max range. The typed value gets modified to fit the range on a focused out state.
Else, it allows any value even out of range value, at that time of wrong value entered, the error class will be added to the component to highlight the error.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfNumericTextBox`1.StrictMode
member.summary:
Specifies a value that indicates whether the NumericTextBox component allows the value for the specified range.
True - the input value will be restricted between the min and max range. The typed value gets modified to fit the range on a focused out state.
Else, it allows any value even out of range value, at that time of wrong value entered, the error class will be added to the component to highlight the error.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating
member.summary: The Blazor Rating component allows the user to rate something by clicking on a set of symbols on numeric scale. This allow users to provide feedback or ratings for products, services, or content.
member.example:
A simple Blazor Rating component with value.
<SfRating Value=3 />
A Blazor Rating component with label.
<SfRating ShowLabel=true />

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.AllowReset
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to show or hide the reset button in a rating component.
member.value: true, the reset button will be visible to the user and they will be able to click it to reset the rating value to its default. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets one or more CSS classes that can be used to customize the appearance of a rating component.
member.value: One or more CSS classes to customize the appearance of the rating component, such as by changing its colors, fonts, sizes, or other visual aspects. The default value is String.Empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.Disabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a rating component is enabled or disabled. A disabled rating component may have a different visual appearance than an enabled one.
member.value: true, the rating component will be disabled and the user will not be able to interact with it. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.EmptyTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a template that defines the appearance of each un-rated item in a rating component. The is passed as a context to the template, allowing it to access information about the un-rated item, such as its and .
member.value: The template content. The default value is null.
member.example: Rating with empty template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.EnableAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to add animation (to provide visual feedback to the user) when an item in a rating component is hovered.
member.value: true, an animation will be added when the user hovers their cursor over an item in the rating component. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.EnableSingleSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to select all the items before the selected item should be in selected state in a rating component.
member.value: true, only the selected item will be in the selected state, and all other items will be un-selected. false, all items before the selected one will be in the selected state. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.FullTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a template that defines the appearance of each rated item in a rating component. The is passed as a context to the template, allowing it to access information about the rated item, such as its and .
member.value: The template content. The default value is null.
member.example: Rating with full template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.ID
member.summary: Sets id attribute for the rating element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.ItemsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the number of items (symbols) in rating component. The rating component typically consists of a number of items, such as stars or other symbols, that represent the rating value.
member.value: An int that specifies the number of items (symbols) displayed in rating component

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the the position of the label in rating component.
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the position of the label. The default value is .
member.remarks: You can use this property to customize the position of the label within the rating component to suit the needs of your application. For example, you can set the LabelPosition property to ,Top to position the label at the top center of the rating component, or set it to Left to position the label at the left side of the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.LabelTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a template that used as label over default label of the rating. The current value of rating passed as context to build the content.
member.value: The template content. The default value is null.
member.example: Rating with label template. @context Out Of 5

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.Min
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that specifies minimum rating that a user can select.
member.value: By default, the Min property is set to 0, which means that the minimum possible rating is 0.
member.remarks: You can use the Min property to customize the minimum possible rating in the SfRating component. For example, if you want to allow users to provide ratings from 1 to 5, you can set the Min property to 1 and ItemsCount to 5.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.Precision
member.summary: Gets or sets the precision type of the rating which used to component the granularity of the rating, allowing users to provide ratings with varying levels of precision.
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the precision type. The default value is .
member.remarks: The Precision property can be set to one of the following values: * Full: The rating is increased in whole number increments. For example, if the current rating is 3, the next possible ratings are 4, 5, and so on. * Half: The rating is increased in increments of 0.5 (half). For example, if the current rating is 3.5, the next possible ratings are 4, 4.5, 5, and so on. * Quarter: The rating is increased in increments of 0.25 (quarter). For example, if the current rating is 3.75, the next possible ratings are 4, 4.25, 4.5, and so on. * Exact: The rating is increased in increments of 0.1. For example, if the current rating is 3.9, the next possible ratings are 4, 4.1, 4.2, and so on.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the read-only mode is enabled for a rating component, which means that the user will be able to interact with it and change the rating value.
member.value: true,the rating component will be in read-only mode, which means that the user will not be able to interact with it and change the rating value. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.ShowLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to display a label that shows the current value of a rating.
member.value: true, a label will be displayed that shows the current value of the rating; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.ShowTooltip
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that defines whether to show tooltip for the items.
member.value: true, show tooltip for the items. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.TooltipTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a template that used as tooltip content over default tooltip content of the rating. The current value of rating passed as context to build the content.
member.value: The template content. The default value is null.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current rating value which used to display and update the rating selected by the user. Based on , users can select ratings with varying levels of precision
member.value: The Value property is a decimal value that ranges from the to the , as specified by the Min and ItemsCount properties of the rating.
member.remarks: You can use the Value property to initialize the rating component with a specific rating value, or to get the current rating value selected by the user. For example, if you want to initialize the rating component with a rating of 3.5, you can set the Value property to 3.5.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfRating.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rating component is visible or hidden
member.value: true, if the rating component is visible. The default value is true.

member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised when the rendering is completed.

member.summary: Update the Value and current value for the rating items.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature
member.summary: Signature allows user to draw smooth signatures as vector outline of strokes using variable width Bzier curve interpolation. It allows to save signature as image. You can use your finger, pen, or mouse on a tablet, touchscreen, etc., to draw your own signature on this Signature component.
member.remarks: Signature is a user interface to draw the signature or text. It supports stroke color, background color and image.
member.example:
In the below code example, a basic Signature initialized with tag directive.
<SfSignature style="height: 100%; width: 100%;"></SfSignature>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will applied to the component.
member.remarks: Additional attributes can be added as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive.
member.example:
In the below code example, signature height and width has been specified as style attribute in .
<SfSignature style="height: 100%; width: 100%;"></SfSignature>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the component.
member.value: The background color of the component that accepts hex value, rgb and text (like red). The default value is null.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.BackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the background image for the component.
member.value: An image that used to fill the background of the component. The default value is null.

member.value: true, if the signature component is disabled for user interaction. The default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to prevent the interaction in component.
member.value: true, if the signature component is read only state where the user interaction is prevented. The default value is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to save the signature along with and while saving.
member.value: true, if signature component to save with background. The default value is true.

member.value: The color of the signature stroke that accepts hex value, rgb and text (like red). The default value is "#000000".

member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum stroke width for signature. The component calculates stroke width based on , and .
member.value: The minimum width of stroke. The default value is 0.5.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.MaxStrokeWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum stroke width for signature. The component calculates stroke width based on , and .
member.value: The maximum width of stroke. The default value is 2.0.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.Velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity to calculate the stroke thickness based on the pressure of the contact on the digitizer surface. The Signature component calculates stroke thickness based on , and .
member.value: The velocity to calculate the stroke thickness based on the pressure of the contact on the digitizer surface. The default value is 0.7.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads.
member.value: true, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Component's property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.Changed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised for the actions like undo, redo, clear and while user complete signing on component.

example.code:
<SfSignature Changed="@changefunc"></SfSignature>
            @code 
            {
                private void changefunc(SignatureChangeEventArgs args) 
                {
                    if (args.ActionName == "Clear")
                    {
                        // validation code goes here
                    }
                }
            }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfSignature.OnSave
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while saving the signature.
member.remarks: The file name and the file type(PNG, JPEG, SVG) can be changed using and . The event callback is raised only for the keyboard action (Ctrl + S).

example.code:
<SfSignature Changed="@beforesavefunc"></SfSignature>
            @code 
            {
                private void beforesavefunc(SignatureSaveEventArgs args) 
                {        
                    args.fileType = "SignatureFileType.Jpeg";
                }
            }

members.member:
Partial class SfSlider.
Generic type parameter..
The Slider component allows the user to select a value or range of values in-between the min and max range, by dragging the handle over the slider bar.
Partial class SfSlider.
Specifies the partial class SfSlider.
Specifies the partial class SfSlider.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.TextBoxModel.FloatLabelType
member.summary:
Specifies the floating label behavior of the TextBox that the placeholder text floats above the TextBox based on the following values.
Possible values are:
Never Never floats the label in the TextBox when the placeholder is available.
Always The floating label always floats above the TextBox.
Auto The floating label floats above the TextBox after focusing it or when enters the value in it.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to prevent the cross site scripting code in filename or not.
member.value: true, if the component prevents the cross site scripting code in filename; otherwise,false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: The Enable HtmlSanitizer property removes the cross-site scripting code or functions from the filename and shows the validation error message to the user.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.SfUploader.AutoUpload
member.summary:
By default, the Uploader component initiates automatic upload when the files are added in upload queue.
If you want to manipulate the files before uploading to server, disable the AutoUpload property.
The buttons "upload" and "clear" will be hided from file list when AutoUpload property is true.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings
member.summary: Specifies the Uploader Events of the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.ChildContent
member.summary: Specifies the content that has to be passed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.ChunkSize
member.summary:
Specifies the ChunkSize to split the large file into chunks, and upload it to the server in a sequential order.
If the ChunkSize property has value, the Uploader enables the chunk upload by default. It must be specified in bytes value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.RemoveUrl
member.summary:
Specifies the URL of remove action that receives the file information and handle the remove operation in server.
The remove action type must be POST request and define "RemoveFileNames" attribute to get file information that will be removed. This property is optional.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.RetryAfterDelay
member.summary: Specifies the delay time in milliseconds that the automatic retry happens after the delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.RetryCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of retries that the Uploader can perform on the file failed to upload. By default, the Uploader set 3 as maximum retries. This property must be specified to prevent infinity looping.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.SaveUrl
member.summary:
Specifies the URL of save action that will receive the upload files and save in the server.
The save action type must be POST request and define the argument as same input name used to render the component. The upload operations could not perform without this property.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Triggers while initial rendering of the component.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Inputs.UploaderAsyncSettings.OnParametersSetAsync
member.summary: Triggers after the component was rendered.
